reporter_caption.center: SCHMIERER v. GREAT NECK WATER, 29 Misc.3d 1209 (2010)

caption.center: Schmierer v. Great Neck Water Pollution Control Dist.

court.center: Supreme Court of the State of New York.

opinion.opinion_text: Labor — Safe Place to Work — Height differential was not de minimis for falling object while being hoisted under Labor Law § 240 (1).
